head.title: Education
head.text-1: Here I show some of my
head.text-2: earned with effort and dedication. I have
head.text-3: on recognized platforms. Each course has been key to
head.strong-3: developing skills in frontend, design, and organization etc.

certification-1.title: Graphic Design
certification-1.description: I'm currently in the first year of the degree program, learning the fundamentals of **visual communication, editorial design, typography, and technology applied to design**. It will allow me to explore the theoretical and practical foundations needed to approach **graphic design projects with a comprehensive and strategic vision**, aimed at enhancing user experience and interface in digital products.

certification-2.title: Soft Skills for Tech Professionals
certification-2.description: Certification in essential soft skills for the technological work environment. I learned techniques for **assertive communication, collaboration in multidisciplinary teams, and efficient project management**, key tools to complement my technical skills in software development and design.

certification-3.title: Game Systems Design Level 1
certification-3.description: Fundamentals of game systems design, where I learned to create **balanced and engaging game mechanics**, design progression systems, and develop functional prototypes. This course laid the groundwork for understanding how systems interact to create memorable gameplay experiences.

certification-4.title: Game Sciences
certification-4.description: Exploration of the theoretical and scientific aspects behind game design. I delved into **player motivation theories, non-linear narrative structures, and emotional design principles**, enabling me to create more immersive and meaningful experiences.

certification-5.title: Advanced Game Design
certification-5.description: Advanced course covering professional aspects of game design. I learned methodologies for **creating levels with effective pacing, implementing player feedback systems, and conducting iterative playtests**, significantly improving the quality of my designs.

certification-6.title: Fundamentals of Game Development
certification-6.description: Practical introduction to game development using Unity. I acquired basic knowledge of **C# programming, physics implementation, asset management, and troubleshooting common issues**, establishing the technical foundation for my design projects.

certification-7.title: Modern Web Design
certification-7.description: Contemporary web design certification covering **UI/UX principles, responsive design, and creating coherent design systems**. I learned to create intuitive and attractive interfaces, optimizing both aesthetics and usability.

certification-8.title: Professional Frontend Development
certification-8.description: Intensive frontend development program where I mastered **semantic HTML, modern CSS (Flexbox, Grid), advanced JavaScript, and React**. I learned to create interactive web applications, consume APIs, and follow good development practices.

certification-9.title: Web Design Principles
certification-9.description: Fundamental course that introduced me to the basic principles of web design. I learned about **selecting effective color palettes, typographic combinations, balanced layouts, and visual flow**, essential skills for creating attractive and functional websites.

certification-10.title: Frontend Programming Fundamentals
certification-10.description: My first web development certification, where I learned the **basic concepts of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript**. This course gave me the tools to start building static web interfaces and understand the interaction between design and functionality.

certification-11.title: Applied Game Theory
certification-11.description: Theoretical-practical course on the conceptual foundations of game design. I explored **different genres, game structures, and analysis methodologies**, developing my ability to critique and improve existing designs and create original concepts.
